ing: 12 ounces fresh green beans, trimmed, cooked al dente
2 ounces basil leaves, trimmed and torn in large pieces
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
3 tablespoons white balsamic or rice vinegar
n: Veggie Potato Salad for a Crowd
des: "Here's a healthy potato salad high in antioxidants from colorful vegetables. The vinegar also lessens the blood-sugar boost of the potatoes."
ins: In a large pot, cook whole potatoes until done. Cool. Cut into bite-sized pieces. In a very large bowl, combine all ingredients from potatoes through basil. Whisk together dressing ingredients. Toss with vegetables, and add salt and pepper to taste. Chill. Serve.
